Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 149th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2009...
Released by Kansas City on 8/16/2011...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 8/16/2011 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/16/2013, off Jon Lester (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/2013, off Kiko Calero (ARI)...
Injured on 4/27/2014 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 6/22/2016 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
